q: What is a template engine in Express.js?
o: Generates dynamic HTML from templates and data

q: The ______ setting configures the template engine.
Template engines separate presentation from logic.
EJS uses ______ tags for JavaScript code.
EJS syntax is similar to PHP and JSP.
Pug produces shorter templates than HTML.
How do you set a view engine in Express?

o: Compiles and sends template to client

q: res.render() takes template name and ______ object.
Variables passed to render() are called locals.
Match the template engines with their syntax:
Escaping prevents XSS attacks in templates.
EJS loops use standard JavaScript ______ syntax.
EJS supports any valid JavaScript expression.
The ______ function includes other EJS files.
Partials reduce code duplication in templates.
Pug classes use ______ notation like CSS selectors.
The ______ prefix outputs unescaped HTML in Pug.
!{} should be used carefully to prevent XSS.
Child templates override ______ defined in parent.
Multiple blocks can be defined in one layout.
Match the Pug features with their syntax:
Mixins can accept arguments like functions.
Includes are processed at compile time.
Rearrange Pug file structure (top to bottom):
Handlebars discourages complex logic in templates.
Built-in helpers include each, if, unless.
Partials must be registered before use.
Match the Handlebars helpers with their purposes:
app.locals.______ makes variable global to templates.
res.locals are cleared after response is sent.
The ______ setting enables template caching in production.
Template caching is enabled by default in production.
Layouts contain common ______ like header and footer.
Different pages can use different layouts.
What is conditional rendering in templates?

o: Iterating over arrays to generate HTML

q: Loops can generate lists, tables, and grids.

o: Loops inside loops for nested data

q: Nested loops are useful for ______-level data.
Deeply nested loops can impact performance.
What is template comments in EJS?
HTML comments are sent to the client.
Match EJS tags with their purposes:
All modern template engines support interpolation.
What is HTML escaping in templates?
o: Converting special chars to HTML entities

q: Raw output should only be used with ______ data.
Never use raw output with user input.
Base templates typically include header, footer, nav.
What is template filters in Nunjucks?
Built-in filters include upper, lower, capitalize.
Filters keep templates clean and readable.
What is static file serving with templates?
o: Serving CSS, JS, images alongside templates

q: Static files are served from ______ folder.
Templates reference static files with absolute paths.
What is asset versioning in templates?
o: Adding version/hash to asset URLs for cache busting

q: Query string or filename versioning works.
Disable hot reload in production for performance.
Template syntax errors show ______ in development.
Detailed errors should be hidden in production.
Translations are stored in separate files.
What is date formatting in templates?
moment.js or ______ are used for date formatting.
Dates should be formatted for user locale.
What is number formatting in templates?
Content Security Policy adds extra protection.

o: Content Security Policy restricting inline scripts

q: CSP nonces allow specific inline scripts.
User input should never control template syntax.
Title and description meta tags help SEO.
What is semantic HTML in templates?
header, nav, main, footer are ______ elements.

o: Making content usable by all users

q: Alt text on images is required for accessibility.
What is responsive design in templates?
o: Templates that adapt to screen sizes

q: Mobile-first design is a best practice.
Well-organized templates are easier to maintain.
Dynamic partials use ______ for partial names.
Dynamic includes enable flexible template composition.

o: Sending data from controller to template

q: Data is passed via res.render second ______.
All passed data becomes available in template.
Custom delimiters avoid ______ with other syntax.
The ______ option enables caching in EJS.
Compile options affect performance and behavior.
Async allows data fetching during render.
Match EJS options with their effects:

o: Sending template output as it's generated

q: Fragment caching is useful for ______ content.
Fragments can have different cache durations.
Donut holes are ______ fragments in cached pages.
User-specific content often needs donut holes.
Snapshot testing can verify template output.
pug-lint and htmlhint are template linters.
Well-documented templates are easier to use.
View options can be overridden per render.
What is custom view engine registration?
o: Adding support for custom template formats

q: Custom engines must follow Express conventions.
Callback receives ______ and html as arguments.

o: Rendering template to string instead of response

q: String render is useful for emails.
Email HTML has different CSS requirements.
What is PDF generation from templates?
PDF generation renders template to HTML first.
API docs can be rendered from ______ specs.

o: Rendering HTML on server before sending

q: Hydration is used in React SSR.

o: Pre-building HTML files at build time

q: SSG sites are very fast and cacheable.

o: Base functionality that improves with JS
Full experience degrades for older browsers

q: Progressive enhancement is preferred over graceful degradation.
Custom error pages improve user experience.
Match template optimizations with their effects:
Minification should be tested before production.
What is EJS layout with express-ejs-layouts?
Different pages can use different layouts.

o: Transform block content with external processors

q: Built-in filters include markdown and cdata.
Nunjucks inheritance is similar to Jinja2.
Include can pass context to included file.
Liquid is safe for untrusted template authors.
Eta is designed for ______ and small bundle size.
Eta can be used as EJS drop-in replacement.

Compiled templates are faster to execute.
React uses virtual DOM for updates.

o: Google's approach without virtual DOM copy

q: Angular Ivy uses incremental DOM concepts.

Linaria and vanilla-extract are compiled solutions.
Tools like critical can automate extraction.
Translators work with extracted string files.
What is plural handling in templates?
o: Correct word forms for different counts

q: Some languages have complex plural rules.
What is RTL support in templates?
Arabic and Hebrew require RTL support.
What is props in template components?
What is slots in template components?
Named slots enable multiple content areas.

o: Building from smallest to largest components

q: What is template visual regression testing?
Percy and Chromatic provide visual testing.

o: Comparing rendered output to saved version

q: Incremental builds only recompile changed files.

GTM can be integrated via templates.
What is A/B testing in templates?
What is feature flags in templates?
LaunchDarkly and Unleash provide flag services.
Email templates use HTML with ______ support.
Print CSS can be used for PDF styling.

o: Creating reports from templates and data

q: Charts can be embedded in report templates.
Strapi and Contentful are headless CMS options.
Version control should track template changes.

o: How templates are released to production

q: Core Web Vitals measure user experience.

o: Verifying CDN resources haven't been tampered

q: SRI should be used for CDN scripts.

Following best practices reduces technical debt.
What is separation of concerns in templates?

o: Switching from one engine to another

q: Automated tools can help with migration.
What is the future of templating?
Island architecture is an emerging pattern.

o: Components that only run on server

q: Server components can't have client interactivity.
What is the final template mastery concept?
o: Understanding tradeoffs and choosing right tool

q: Template choice depends on project requirements.
Buffered code is HTML escaped by default.

o: Code that doesn't output to template

q: Unbuffered code is for template logic.
Text mode is useful for inline content.
Helpers are passed via ______ or locals.
Common helpers include date formatting, currency.

o: Middleware adding helpers to all templates

q: Helper middleware runs before route handlers.
Async allows database calls in templates.
Middleware can add common data to all renders.
What is template expression in Handlebars?
React views enable SSR with Express.
express-vue enables Vue SSR in Express.
Twing is a Twig ______ for JavaScript.
Twig syntax is similar to Jinja2.
views can be an ______ of paths.
Form templates can include validation feedback.

o: Content container with image and text
Large banner at top of page

q: Call-to-action buttons are common in heroes.

o: Bottom section with links and info

q: Footer is typically consistent across pages.
YouTube and Vimeo use iframe embeds.

o: Choose based on team experience and needs

q: There is no single best template engine.
What is EJS include path options?
include() can use ______ or relative paths.
Root option sets base directory for includes.
Literal tags are useful for documentation.
What is Pug plain text block?
Inline scripts should be minimal in templates.
